description:
The 2017 People’s Choice Awards kick off on Wednesday night, honoring some of the best movies, TV shows, and music of the past year.2017年人民选择奖颁奖典礼于周三晚拉开帷幕，为过去一年最棒的电影、电视剧和音乐给予嘉奖。

A whopping 64 categories are up for grabs on the big night. Nominees to keep an eye on include “Captain America: Civil War,” which topped the nods with seven. In TV, “Grey’s Anatomy” leads the nominations with five.这一晚，庞大的64项类别奖项等待角逐。提名者包括7项大奖领跑的《美国队长3：内战》。在电视剧类，《实习医生格蕾》以5项大奖提名领跑。

以下是2017人民选择奖完整的获奖名单：

 MOVIES电影

FAVORITE MOVIE最受欢迎电影

Captain America: Civil War《美国队长3：内战》
Deadpool《死侍》
Finding Dory 《海底总动员：寻找多莉》
Suicide Squad《自杀小队》
Zootopia《疯狂动物城》

FAVORITE MOVIE ACTOR最受欢迎电影男演员
Kevin Hart
Robert Downey Jr.
Ryan Reynolds(WINNER)
Tom Hanks
Will Smith

FAVORITE MOVIE ACTRESS最受欢迎电影女演员

Anna Kendrick
Jennifer Lawrence(WINNER)
Margot Robbie
Melissa McCarthy
Scarlett Johansson

FAVORITE ACTION MOVIE最受欢迎动作电影

Batman v. Superman: Dawn of Justice《蝙蝠侠大战超人：正义黎明》
Captain America: Civil War《美国队长3：内战》
Deadpool(WINNER)《死侍》
Suicide Squad《自杀小队》
X-Men: Apocalypse《X战警：天启》

Robert Downey Jr. (WINNER)
Chris Evans
Liam Hemsworth
